Name: GRINDSHIFT
About the game: GRINDSHIFT - stylized hoverboard game. Simple gameplay: There are no objectives or unlockables, just freely move around on your hoverboard using traditional WASD movements. Hop on rails to automatically begin grinding, or head to the halfpipe and launch up in the air and perform rotations, flips and tricks. A score counter adds up all scores achieved in the same gameplay session. A colorful and spacious hoverboard playground awaits!
